title: Simulation-Based Computational Chemistry E-Learning Expert Course

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of general chemistry and basic quantum chemistry, along with foundational programming experience
context.additional_context: Acquisition of molecular modeling and computational chemistry analysis skills through virtual simulations in environments without experimental equipment

learning_goals: Perform electronic structure calculations of organic molecules using computational chemistry software such as Gaussian
Design 3D molecular structure visualization and reaction pathway simulations in VR environments
Write reactivity prediction reports for compounds based on molecular orbital analysis results
Develop computational chemistry workflows for solving real-world chemical problems through collaborative projects
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
